moreBlocks.articles:
• d'Oliveira & Associates opens office in Woonsocket, RI, Personal Injury Blog, November 1, 2014
    d’Oliveira & Associates’ new Woonsocket, RI Personal Injury Law Office is located at 62 Hamlet Avenue, Woonsocket, RI 02895. The move will enable the Firm to maintain closer contact with its clients in the Woonsocket, RI area.
  • Construction Accidents And How To Prevent Them, Personal Injury Blog, June 28, 2017
    13 workers recently injured. How to prevent things like this from happening.
  • FDA Warns Consumers About Purported Autism Cures, Personal Injury Blog, June 9, 2017
    FDA warnings about "autism" cures.
  • Proton Pump Inhibitors Linked to Higher Risk of Death, Personal Injury Blog, August 4, 2017
    Popular drug used by millions of Americans linked to higher risk of death. Drugs like Prilosec, Nexium, and Prevacid.
  • Researchers Question Efficacy of Abilify to Treat Depression, Personal Injury Blog, September 14, 2017
    Based on a new study, researchers are saying that the drug Abilify may not be effective at treating depression because its risks of serious side effects outweigh any benefits it may provide.

description:
Serving Accident Victims In Fall River and The Surrounding Areas

When dealing with an injury or loss caused by someone else's negligence, you want to ensure you have an attorney who will help you recover the compensation you need as quickly as possible.

Compassionate Counsel, Effective Results

The attorneys at d'Oliveira & Associates P.C., in Fall River, Massachusetts, understand what you are going through, and we promise to devote our time and resources to advocating on behalf of your rights and interests to help you get the finances you need to support yourself and your family when you can no longer work.

Handling only personal injury, workers' compensation and Social Security Disability claims, the attorneys at our law firm have the extensive knowledge and experience required to handle even the most complex and challenging cases.

Over the course of our careers, we have recovered more than $200 million on behalf of our clients, and we have secured out-of-court settlements in over 95 percent of the cases we have handled.

The Experience You Need

To put almost 100 years of combined legal experience to work for you, helping you get the compensation and benefits you deserve, you can contact d'Oliveira & Associates P.C. either by calling our law office or visiting our website to receive a free initial consultation. We operate under a no recovery/no fee policy, so you have nothing to lose to find out how our law firm can best serve your needs.
